title: The connections file could not be saved as ""! The provided key was not found in the dictionary.
author: medusaalb
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
I have update my mariadb from 10.1 to 10.6
i imported my data from the older databse to new (in diferents servers)
When i add or modify a register this erro appears
The connections file could not be saved as ""!
The provided key was not found in the dictionary.
but if no import and start with an empty database it works perfectly
Thanks in advance
